tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE meteorological_data (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  temperature FLOAT,
  humidity FLOAT,
  pressure FLOAT,
  rainfall FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE meteorological_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  city VARCHAR(50),
  temperature FLOAT,
  humidity FLOAT,
  rainfall FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE disease_outbreaks (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  city VARCHAR(50),
  disease_name VARCHAR(50),
  outbreak_date DATE,
  affected_population INT
);

CREATE TABLE meteorological_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    temperature FLOAT,
    humidity FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE disease_outbreaks (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    disease VARCHAR(255),
    cases INT
);

CREATE TABLE environmental_changes (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    change_type VARCHAR(255),
    description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE MeteorologicalData (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    city_name VARCHAR(255),
    temperature FLOAT,
    humidity FLOAT,
    wind_speed FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE CorrelationData (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    meteorological_id INT,
    outbreak_id INT,
    change_id INT,
    correlation_score FLOAT
);
